Name: Reality End
About the game: Reality End Metaverse Shooter. 2022 new version includes VR and Non-VR Modes, Ready Player Me Avatars, Vehicles, Tanks, Cars, Special Attacks, and Voice chat. and A few more? Features Room-based multiplayer, currently up to 3000 players per room. Yet never tested. waiting for the 2999 player. maybe it's you! Full hands controller support. Play as a human or as an android - does it really matter? zombies are coming next year. 4 game maps - In Beta stage, or Alpha stage, or if yo fall somewhere, don't complain just, you know... only 2 online. 10 more are underground. Ready Player Me - Meraverse avatars support - This is a real must! Vehicles including Cars and Tanks - Don't let them sink in the sand. Special attacks - UAV, Drone support, and Missile. Should work. at least the Drone works occasionally 4 Game modes: Free for all, Team Deathmatch, Capture the flag, Demolition. Left/Right-handedness support. In most parts. Voice communication. AI bots. well, they could use a leader like you. well. not have to be a leader, anyway, they are there. It's a fact. don't run from it. and they can kill you, virtually I mean. VR Hand Pad with command buttons Updating every day!
